mp3Text: Got a bat's eye view of the battle.
If you don't ride into battle, you don't ride at all.
Gonna ride this bat outta hell like a bat outta hell!
Got a bat's eye view of the battle.
If you don't ride into battle, you don't ride at all.
Yeah, baby, it’s in the bag!
Keepin my knees in the breeze.
I got something to show ya.
Ha ha ha ha ha! Woo hoo!
I'll have the brisket. My hoss'll have your head.
Roasted, toasted and burned to a crisp.
A message from on high: You're dead!
Killed you without battin an eye.
Ah, that's what I'm talking about!
It's not the bat you gotta worry about. She eats fruit.
Ooh, got a bad case of lane rash there.
Hey, ask permission the next time you wanna feed my bat.
Oh, Lina, I was hoping you'd be my backwarmer.
I'm not speakin ill of Lina when her ashes are still warm.
Damn, Lina, I carried such a torch for ya.
Aw, Queenie, in another life we'd a been soulmates, I just know it!
Drow Ranger, don't be a stranger.
I know, Vengeful: Chicks rule. They also die.
I gotta say, Enchantress: You are spunky.
Spectre, I have no idea what you just said, but I could listen to you all day.
Crystal Maiden, you were a tall glass of ice water.
Always a pleasure being stalked by the Templar Assassin.
Death Prophet, I'm the one your visions been warning you about.
Mirana, I think your ride and mine have a thing for each other.
Broodmother, if you weren't already—ugh, never mind!
I wish I could have got a better look at you, Phantom Assassin.
Night Stalker, why have wings if you're not gonna fly.
Shoulda warned ya, Storm Spirit. She likes fruit.
Aw, Pudge, I thought you knew all about choppers.
Uh, usually Pudge, I like a chopped hog. But you the wrong sort.
Hey Void! Have you seen Bat to the Future?
Aw, Viper, and I was gonna take you out for a spin.
I rode a dragon once. Really chapped my hide.
One time I was riding this dragon when the damn thing turned into a knight!
Okay, Jakiro, which one of you wants to take me for a ride?
First Blood, right off the bat! Ha ha ha!
All the gear, all the time.
Now I can burn at both ends.
Force Staff! I got a rep for being pushy.
Vanguard! That's where you'll always find me.
Arcane Boots for an arson bat.
Thought I could tough it out.
I'll join you in death, old girl.
No such thing as a free ride.
Light then throw. Light then throw.
Gonna ride this bat outta hell like a bat outta hell!
Nothin like the feel of my old bat between my legs.
Now where'd I put my brainbucket?
Hey, did someone hide my chaps?
Hoo, hit a crosswind back there!
Me an my hognose, hittin the lanes!
Time for a little lane rage!
You wanna play rough? All right, we'll play rough.
I'll need it when I need it.
Eh, stuff it in the saddlebags.
Only other bats will know we're still here.

text: Third and more attempts within 10 seconds
Third and more attempts within 10 seconds

mp3Text: I remember when you were barely a rat with wings. Now look atcha!
If you wanna ride fast, you gotta ride alone.
Hoss here has a two-stroke engine. Gotta pet her twice to get her going.
Aw yeah, off we ride into the sunset.
